text: In the Chu Kingdom lived a man who sold spears and shields. "My shields are so strong", he boasted, "that nothing can pass them". My spears are so sharp that nothing can penetrate. - What if one of your spears hits one of your shields? - someone asked. The salesman didn't know what to answer. FIN
title: El vendedor de lanzas y escudos
author: nan Anónimo
